document.full_text: the fifth movie in the "x-men" series took the no. 1 spot at the worldwide box office after selling about $120 million worth of tickets, distributor 20th century fox said on sunday.
document.title: new "x-men" tops class at worldwide box office
lines_and_colors: the fifth movie in the "x-men" series took the no. 1 spot at the worldwide box office after selling about $120 million worth of tickets, distributor 20th century fox said on sunday.
